  • Passenger Comfort: For management, site visits, or client transportation, the Passenger model blends the rugged reliability of a pickup with the comfort and advanced technology of an SUV. It features a sophisticated interior and modern safety amenities.
  • Extreme Off-Road Capability: For businesses requiring access to remote sites, desert exploration, or intense off-road logistics, the Sinotruk Bolden Off-Road model offers advanced 4x4 systems, enhanced ground clearance, and specialised off-road features to tackle the toughest UAE terrain with confidence.

The Sinotruk Bolden offers modern infotainment and connectivity features, keeping drivers informed and connected, which is a key factor for driver retention and productivity.
